articles.author: Charlotte Dean
articles.title: Uma Thurman opts for daytime chic in a black dress in Cannes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 53, looked lovely in a textured black dress with a crop waist, which she styled with a chic cropped jacket.
articles.content:
She was the belle of the ball during the opening night of the Cannes Film Festival where Johnny Depp's new film Jeanne du Barry was premiered.
And the following day, Uma Thurman proved she does dayt… [+3217 chars]
